specials_info:
An old man gives you this riddle in order to pass:
 Once man alive 
 Now living death 
 It drinketh blood 
 N' stealeth breath.
 Answer:"VAMPIRE".
 Else: Fight -> Battle vs. [Master Sorcerer]

Magic Mouth Riddle: "Past warscapes fought by men long dead, and treasures lost on bloodied fields, the One God lifts his thorn-crowned head, and lays a strength on friendly.." -> Answer: SHIELDS -> Item: "Ybarrashield"
